item.title: Nerdifying music library management with beets
item.description: beets is the endgame music library management system for me. I set it up on my linux server (running Debian Buster). Installation I like living on the bleeding-edge (despite my stability policy on my server) and intended to tinker with the code, so I installed beets from the GitHub repo as an editable pip package as described here. cd ~/git git clone git@github.com:beetbox/beets.git cd ~/git/beets python3 -m pip install --user -e .
